subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Despite reports that Tim Tebow asked out of the Jets’ Wildcat formation when he was passed over to start Sunday’s game, Coach Rex Ryan said Tebow “would have gone in and played” if asked.
snippet: Despite reports that Tim Tebow asked out of the Jets’ Wildcat formation when he was passed over to start Sunday’s game, Coach Rex Ryan said Tebow “would have gone in and played” if asked.
